title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Airbus A320 V2- Using Simbrief integration
description:
In this video we will look at how to use the Simbrief integration in the A320 V2 which became available with the release of Sim Update 15. We start with looking at the EFB and continue using the values calculated by the EFB to populate the MCDU.

00:00 intro
00:10 setting up the EFB
00:48 finding your Simbrief ID and selecting the correct aircraft frame
02:09 continue setting up the EFB and using the functionality
02:48 setting up the MCDU
03:49 finding the flight number and cost index (CI)
05:07 calculating the take-off speed
07:11 setting up the take-off speed in the MCDU
08:58 where to find the A320 V2 manual
